EmailTemplate.name: RE: Welcome back to MBO! (1350589850.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Welcome back to MBO! (1350589850.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, Sure thing. You can find all that information by visiting my private landing page here. <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> Please also see my responses below. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Dumouchelle [mailto:tom.dumouchelle@verizon.net] Sent: Thursday, October 18, 2012 12:07 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Jacqueline Crook Subject: Re: Welcome back to MBO! Sara - Thanks for the prompt response. I'm not ready to rejoin just yet, because I need to look at the benefits and costs to figure out my rate to this new potential client. If I need to create an account to see all that info, then I'm happy to do so. See link above for these details. I also need to confirm the MBO fee structure. When I was there previously, my fee was 4% and was capped/ significantly reduces after I achieve a certain level of billing. The fee works as follows; 5.0% of the first $125,000 of cash receipts from Clients for services beginning on Effective Date and each anniversary thereafter. 1.5% after the first $125,000 of cash receipts from Clients with the Standard Associate Fee Plan until the anniversary of Effective Date. I'm also curious if the deferred profit sharing is still in effect, which allows me to put away large contributions into my 401(k). Yes it is; details in link above. I'm you you get the idea; just trying to get a handle on how things are now vs. when I left. Yep, I understand! J Thanks!!~TomP.S. - I was surprised to see that you still have me up on the website under the success stories. Glad to see that marketing effort is still getting traction. Yes, you were an MBO keeper! J On Oct 18, 2012, at 10:49 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Tom, Welcome back to MBO! I received yoru contact information from Jackie Crook, Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15U%2B0Nj5vOMIaHokznFWo6tqbVnBvmo3MoqsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the Enrollment link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15U%2B0Nj5vOMIaHokznFWo6tqbVnBvmo3MoqsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15U%2B0Nj5vOMIaHokznFWo6tqbVnBvmo3MoqsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15U%2B0Nj5vOMIaHokznFWo6tqbVnBvmo3MoqsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed.
